def rebrand_corporation(n, m, initial_name, designers_actions):
    f = dict(zip('', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'))
    t = dict(zip('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'))
    for (a, b) in designers_actions:
        A = t[a]
        B = t[b]
        f[A] = b
        f[B] = a
        t[a] = B
        t[b] = A
    new_name = ''.join((f[c] for c in initial_name))
    return new_name

def rebrand_corporation(n, m, initial_name, designers_actions):
    f = dict(zip('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'))

def rebrand_corporation(n, m, initial_name, designers_actions):
    f = dict(zip('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'))
    t = dict(zip('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'))
    for (a, b) in designers_actions:
        A = t[a]
        B = t[b]
        f[A] = b
        f[B] = a
        t[a] = B
        t[b] = A
    new_name = 'MUTATED'.join((f[c] for c in initial_name))
    return new_name
